com.github.randomcodeorg.ppplugin.ppdefaults

Class AbstractClassModificationProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.randomcodeorg.ppplugin.ppdefaults.AbstractClassModificationProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.randomcodeorg.ppplugin.PProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLoggingProcessor

    public abstract class AbstractClassModificationProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.github.randomcodeorg.ppplugin.PProcessor
    A processor that iterates over all compiled classes. You can inherit from this processor to modify such classes.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

      • doRun

        protected void doRun()
              throws javassist.NotFoundException
        Iterates over all compiled classes and calls processClass(ByteCodeHelper, CtClass, Class).
        Throws:
        javassist.NotFoundException - Is thrown if the javassist ClassPool could not be created.

      • processClass

        protected abstract void processClass(ByteCodeHelper helper,
                                     javassist.CtClass ctClass,
                                     java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
                              throws javassist.CannotCompileException
        Processes the given class. Be sure to call ByteCodeHelper.edit(CtClass, Class) of the given helper if a class was edited. A call to ByteCodeHelper.commit() will be done automatically.
        Parameters:
        helper - The ByteCodeHelper to be used.
        ctClass - The javassist CtClass to process.
        clazz - The corresponding Class.
        Throws:
        javassist.CannotCompileException - If the changes could not be compiled.
